footer.slogan: Modern practice management for modern law firms. Streamline your workflow and focus on what matters.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.label: Get in Touch
contact.desc: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.

promo.desc: Whether you're looking to streamline your practice or have questions about our platform, we're here to help.
promo.fast_desc: We respond to all inquiries within 24 hours
promo.secure_desc: Your information is protected with bank-grade encryption
promo.support_desc: Our team of legal tech specialists is ready to help

security.title: Security
security.label: Security First
security.hero_desc: We protect your sensitive client information with industry-leading encryption, strict access controls, and regular security audits.
security.encryption_desc: Data is encrypted in transit using tls 1.3 and at rest using AES-256. Your documents and communications are secure from the moment they leave your device.
security.infrastructure_desc: Hosted on secure, SOC 2 compliant cloud infrastructure with automated backups and geographic redundancy to ensure high availability.
security.compliance_desc: We are committed to maintaining compliance with global standards including GDPR, CCPA, and legal industry regulations for data handling.
security.access_desc: Role-based access control (RBAC), multi-factor authentication (MFA), and detailed audit logs give you complete control and visibility over your data.
security.cta_desc: Join hundreds of law firms trusting LexLegal Cloud with their data.

privacy.title: Data Processing Policy
privacy.intro: LexLegal Cloud respects the personal data and information provided by its current, past, and potential clients. This Personal Data Protection Policy establishes the purposes, measures, and procedures for our databases, as well as the mechanisms available to data holders to know, update, rectify, delete provided data, or revoke the authorization granted with the acceptance of this policy, in accordance with Statutory Law 1581 of 2012 and Decree 1377 of 2013.
privacy.section1_content: LexLegal Cloud, as the entity responsible for processing personal data, informs that collected data will be processed legally, lawfully, confidentially, and securely.
privacy.section2_content: The processing of personal data has the following purposes: a) To carry out relevant management for the development of the company's social object. b) To send invitations to events, manage processes (requests, complaints, claims). c) To manage the contractual relationship with the client. d) Billing and accounting management. e) To conduct satisfaction surveys.
privacy.section3_content: As the holder of your personal data, you have the right to: (i) Access your data free of charge. (ii) Know, update, and rectify your information regarding partial, inaccurate, incomplete, fractionated, misleading data, or data whose processing is prohibited. (iii) Request proof of the authorization granted. (iv) File complaints with the Superintendence of Industry and Commerce (SIC). (v) Revoke authorization and/or request data deletion.
privacy.section4_content: The processing of personal data carried out by the company requires the free, prior, express, and informed consent of the data holder. By accepting this policy, you state that the data provided is truthful and that you have the authority to authorize its processing.
privacy.section5_content: We have implemented the necessary technical, administrative, and human security measures to protect your information and prevent its adulteration, loss, lateral consultation, use, or unauthorized or fraudulent access, complying with the standards required by the Superintendence of Industry and Commerce.
privacy.section6_content: To exercise your rights as a data holder, you can contact us at any time at the email address:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Please read these Terms of Service carefully before using the LexLegal Cloud application.
terms.section1_content: By accessing or using the Service you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms then you may not access the Service.
terms.section2_content: When you create an account with us, you must provide us information that is accurate, complete, and current at all times. Failure to do so constitutes a breach of the Terms, which may result in immediate termination of your account on our Service.
terms.section3_content: The Service and its original content, features and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of LexLegal Cloud Inc and its licensors.
terms.section4_content: You retain all rights to the content you upload to the Service. By uploading content, you grant us a license to store and display that content as necessary to provide the Service.
terms.section5_content: We may terminate or suspend access to our Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.
terms.section6_content: In no event shall LexLegal Cloud Inc, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages.
terms.section7_content: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the Republic of Colombia. Any dispute related to these terms shall be submitted to the competent judges of the Republic of Colombia.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.intro: This Cookie Policy explains what cookies are and how we use them.
cookies.section1_content: Cookies are small text files that are sent to your web browser by a website you visit. A cookie file is stored in your web browser and allows the Service or a third-party to recognize you and make your next visit easier and the Service more useful to you.
cookies.section2_content: When you use and access the Service, we may place a number of cookies files in your web browser. We use cookies for the following purposes: to enable certain functions of the Service, to provide analytics, to store your preferences, to enable advertisements delivery, including behavioral advertising.
cookies.section3_content: We use essential cookies to authenticate users and prevent fraudulent use of user accounts.
cookies.section4_content: We use analytics cookies to track information about how the Service is used so we can make improvements. We may also use analytics cookies to test new features or pages.
cookies.section5_content: You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish. You can delete all cookies that are already on your computer and you can set most browsers to prevent them from being placed. If you do this, however, you may have to manually adjust some preferences every time you visit a site and some services and functionalities may not work.

compliance.title: Security
compliance.label: Security
compliance.hero_desc: We prioritize the security and privacy of your data with industry best practices.
compliance.encryption_desc: All data transmitted between your browser and our servers is encrypted using TLS/SSL, ensuring your information remains private and secure.
compliance.auth_desc: Password hashing with bcrypt and secure session management protect your account from unauthorized access.
compliance.privacy_desc: Your data belongs to you. We follow strict data handling practices and never share your information with third parties.
compliance.access_desc: Granular permissions ensure that users only access the information they need. Administrators, lawyers, staff, and clients each have appropriate access levels.
compliance.cta_desc: Our team is ready to discuss your specific security requirements.

about.title: About Us
about.mission_desc: We're building the operating system for the modern law practice. Our mission is to eliminate administrative busywork so lawyers can focus on what they do best: practicing law.

values.innovation_desc: We constantly push the boundaries of legal tech, using AI and automation to solve real-world problems.
values.trust_desc: Security and reliability are at the core of everything we build. Your data is our top priority.
values.partnership_desc: We succeed when our customers succeed. We're not just a vendor; we're a partner in your growth.

about.team_desc: A diverse team of engineers, designers, and legal experts.

pricing.label: Pricing
pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your practice
pricing.coming_soon_desc: We are currently finalizing our pricing plans. Stay tuned!

q1.question: How secure is my data?
q1.answer: We use bank-level 256-bit encryption for all data in transit and at rest. Our infrastructure is SOC 2 Type II certified and we undergo regular third-party security audits. Your data is backed up daily and stored in geographically distributed data centers.

q2.question: Can I migrate from my current system?
q2.answer: Yes! We offer free data migration assistance for all new customers. Our team will work with you to import your existing cases, contacts, and documents from most major practice management systems.

q3.question: Is there a free trial?
q3.answer: Absolutely! We offer a 14-day free trial with full access to all features. No credit card required. You can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel at any time.

q4.question: What kind of support do you offer?
q4.answer: All plans include email support with response times under 24 hours. Professional and Enterprise plans get priority support with faster response times. Enterprise customers also receive a dedicated account manager and 24/7 phone support.

q5.question: Can I customize workflows?
q5.answer: Yes! Our workflow builder allows you to create custom automation tailored to your practice. Professional and Enterprise plans include advanced workflow features and custom integrations with your existing tools.

final_cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Practice?
final_cta.subtitle: Contact our support team for any questions or assistance.
